title: SpanQuery subclass fields should be protected and final
description: I needed access to SpanNearQuery.collectPayloads but annoyingly found it to be private, forcing my subclass to store a copy.  For that matter, I think it's good practice for these fields to be declared final.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: This is obsoleted by the SpanCollector API in Lucene 5.3
